name: Twilio API Demo
description: A barebones Node.js app using Express and the Twilio API

TWILIO_NUMBER.description: A valid twilio number (of the form +12223334444) with SMS capability that is connected to your account.

AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your account's auth token (you can find this on your account overview page).

ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your account's SID (you can find this on your account overview page).
